CustomField.description: List total price for this quote line item.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(AND(SBQQ__Renewal__c, !SBQQ__Existing__c, !SBQQ__CarryoverLine__c, ISBLANK(SBQQ__PriorQuantity__c)),SBQQ__Bundled__c),0,CASE(SBQQ__PricingMethod__c,'Block',SBQQ__ProratedListPrice__c * SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c,SBQQ__ProratedListPrice__c * IF(OR(AND(!SBQQ__Existing__c, !SBQQ__CarryoverLine__c), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__SubscriptionPricing__c, 'Percent Of Total')),SBQQ__Quantity__c,SBQQ__Quantity__c - BLANKVALUE(SBQQ__PriorQuantity__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(SBQQ__UpgradedQuantity__c, 0))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List total price for this quote line item.
CustomField.label: List Total
